doc.title: Diff
doc.section:
Compare files to view changes.
Besides the status icons, Ankh gives you a more detailed view of the changes made to files. This is done with the ‘Diff’ command.
Description
Display the differences between two paths. Each TARGET can be either a working copy path or URL. If TARGET is a working copy path, then the client compares base and working copies of TARGET.
Changes
Nothing.
